Reviews.AuthorLocation: Newcastle upon Tyne, England, United Kingdom
Reviews.Title: “very basic but clean and friendly”
Reviews.Author: Aisleen M
Reviews.Content: stayed university trip amsterdam expectations pleasently surprised arrived staff friendly stayed 3rd floor stairs nightmare ridiculously steep lift key card spacious 3 single beds bright clean towels provided clean pressure temperature shower hair washed none breakfast served morning basic cereal rice cakes toast coffee tea apple juice job tram line outside close centre fussed luxery perfect

Reviews.Title: “charged a further 220 euro after we had already paid upfront for private room”
Reviews.Author: irishgirl1988
Reviews.Content: stayed days march 2012 paid bit hostel due decent stay biggest mistake trip pay upfront told arrival smoking smoked forced pay 100 euro fine plus handed keys refused refund 20 euro stating contribute smoking fair broke rules 120 euro absolutely destroyed extortionate add insult injury left hostel day returned stay expensive private paid informed staff pay 100 euro stay hostel refused refund option apparently canceling forced cancel due money pay refused refund canceling absolute joke recommend hostel nice stay

Reviews.Title: “Basic but very clean - all you need”
Reviews.Author: samrich77
Reviews.Content: visited hotel girlfriend organised trip initially sceptical mixed reviews pleasantly surprised hotel basic en suite communal clean stayed contained single beds comfortable fresh towels cupboard additional cost previously stated breakfast basic self service choice cereals toast rice crackers fresh teacoffee fruit juices internet available reception wifi free throughout hotel ground floor previously stated accessible using swipe cards controlled access hotel entrance experience excessive noise guests close supermarket tram lines central location vending machine lobby sells tins beer e15 softdrinks overall satisfied stay reccommend friends fancy base

Reviews.Title: “I've stayed in much worse, but can get better in Amsterdam”
Reviews.Author: twentyfourthworld
Reviews.Content: bedroom clean sink mirror handy wifi plus location easy heineken brewery walk museumplein red light district etc recommend tram train station hostel secure wasnt loud tiny sharing people dont lack personal space paid hotel prices bog standard hostel book late try book youll amsterdam thats price paying 25 night showers floor waited 30 mins morning annoying explore youve booking dont worry youll enjoy amsterdam theres terrible hostel youre looking book id recommend shopping online ive stayed amsterdam

Reviews.Title: “Wow.. thats a lot of stairs..”
Reviews.Author: Carlystar
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 month tour europe hotel expensive compared hostels stayed europe top floor stairs steep steps pleasant time trying carry suitcases 3 person private bathroom bathroom size huge wall friend stuffing towel bugs beam caused issues sitting bed location ok close heineken factory walking distance bus stop road cafes corner reception ok overly friendly answered questions

Reviews.Title: “Nasty is not the word to use, it worst than nasty”
Reviews.Author: chipmonks_10
Reviews.Content: location getting flight morning tired greeted rudely front desk person actually waiting lounge hour lounge gloomy dirty dirty dishes tables beds uncomfortable comforter blood stains awful smell coming bathroom advise travellers stay hotel disappointed treated guy morning shift atmosphere hotel

HotelInfo.Name: Euphemia Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: Fokke Simonszstraat 1-9, Amsterdam 1017 TD, The Netherlands
